Question.Subject: Blocking pop-ups on Safari?
Question.Content: How block the pop ups on Safari.When i used IE I never got pop ups now I do.Also when my sister uses Safari I have never seen her have pop ups.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Click the icon that looks like a flower next to the icon the looks like a piece of paper. There will be a menu that comes up Hide Menu Bar/Show Menu Bar Hide Bookmarks Bar/Show Bookmarks Bar Hide Status Bar/Show Status Bar Hide Tab Bar/Show Tab Bar Customize Toolbar History Downloads Private Browsing Reset Safari Block Pop-up Windows Preferences Help Report Bugs To Apple About Safari
For future reference just click Show Menu Bar then on the menu bar click edit and then click Block Pop-up Windows.

Answer.Content:
Click the icon that looks like a flower next to the icon the looks like a piece of paper. There will be a menu that comes up Hide Menu Bar/Show Menu Bar Hide Bookmarks Bar/Show Bookmarks Bar Hide Status Bar/Show Status Bar Hide Tab Bar/Show Tab Bar Customize Toolbar History Downloads Private Browsing Reset Safari Block Pop-up Windows Preferences Help Report Bugs To Apple About Safari
For future reference just click Show Menu Bar then on the menu bar click edit and then click Block Pop-up Windows.
